hero.title: Discover Chengdu with a Local Guide
hero.subtitle: Experience authentic Sichuan culture, taste amazing food, and explore hidden gems with personalized tours

about.title: Your Local Chengdu Expert
about.description: With years of experience living in Chengdu, I'm passionate about sharing the authentic culture, delicious food, and hidden stories of this amazing city with travelers from around the world.

hero.title: Your Chengdu Cultural Expert
hero.subtitle: I'm a local guide passionate about Chengdu culture, dedicated to providing visitors with the most authentic Chengdu experience. With 8 years of professional experience and certified qualifications, I carefully customize exclusive itineraries for each visitor.

personal.title: Personal Introduction
personal.name: Guide Zhang
personal.description: I'm a local guide passionate about Chengdu culture with rich tourism service experience. I'm committed to providing every visitor with the most authentic and unforgettable Chengdu experience.

passion.title: Love for Tour Guiding
passion.content: I've been fascinated by history and culture since childhood, and chose to become a tour guide after graduation. Over 8 years, I've welcomed visitors from around the world, with each explanation being a cultural transmission and exchange.
points: Carefully customize exclusive itineraries for each visitor
Deep understanding of Chengdu's historical and cultural heritage
Continuously learning to improve professional service level
Sincerely sharing the beauty and charm of Chengdu

chengdu.title: Chengdu in My Eyes
chengdu.content: Chengdu is an inclusive and open city with both deep historical and cultural heritage and modern urban vitality. Here, you can feel the comfort of slow living and experience the rich diversity of food culture.

zhang.name: Ms. Zhang
zhang.comment: Very professional guide service, helped us deeply understand Chengdu's culture and history. All food recommendations were excellent!

john.name: John Smith
john.comment: Amazing experience! The guide was knowledgeable and spoke excellent English. Highly recommend!

li.name: Mr. Li
li.comment: Traveled to Chengdu with family, children especially loved the panda base tour. The guide was patient and thoughtful.

info.title: Contact Information

workingHours.title: Working Hours
workingHours.emergency: Emergency Contact: During holidays, if you have urgent matters, you can contact us via WeChat and we will reply as soon as possible.

q1.question: How to book travel services?
q1.answer: You can contact us by phone, email or WeChat, and we will customize an exclusive travel plan according to your needs.

q2.question: Do you provide English guide services?
q2.answer: Yes, we provide professional bilingual Chinese-English guide services to ensure international tourists can deeply understand Chengdu culture.

q3.question: What does the tour fee include?
q3.answer: The fee usually includes guide services, attraction tickets, transportation, etc. Specific items will be explained in detail when booking.

q4.question: Can I cancel or change the itinerary temporarily?
q4.answer: We understand that travel plans may change. Free changes are available with 24 hours advance notice. Please consult customer service for specific policies.
